text: Gayle Gardner is a retired sportscaster who worked with ESPN and NBC. She was an anchor for SportsCenter for three years before NBC hired her. While she worked at NBC, she covered the NFL, Major League Baseball, tennis, college football, and the Olympics. title: Gayle Gardner
